params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the item `div`

params.name: title.text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the title. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: title.html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required.

params.name: title.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the title wrapper

params.name: tag.text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the value. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: tag.html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the value. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: tag.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the tag wrapper

params.name: url.text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the title. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: url.html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the value. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: url.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the actions wrapper

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the container.

name: idPrefix
description: String to prefix ID for the tag and hint for each task list item. If `idPrefix` is not passed, fallback to using the `task-list` string instead.
